intent_atoms.description: Add a dedicated "Corruption" section to the inspector detail pane so investigators can review tolerant parsing diagnostics for the selected node without leaving the primary workflow.
Selecting a node with ParseIssue entries reveals a "Corruption" section summarizing each issue (severity icon, error code, message, byte range).
Byte offsets, lengths, and reason codes are copyable via standard text selection or explicit copy actions.
Issue rows expose affordances to jump to the associated hex range or open follow-up actions when available.
VoiceOver announces the section heading and each issue row with severity context and actionable hints, matching accessibility guidance from prior tolerant parsing tasks.
Introduce a dedicated CorruptionIssueSection component used by DetailView when node issues non‑empty.
Reuse CorruptionIssueRow presentation patterns established in the badge work, ensuring severity color tokens and iconography …

functional_units.name: Corruption Section in Inspector Detail Pane
functional_units.description: Displays a list of parsing issues for the selected node, including severity icon, error code, message, and byte range.

functional_units.name: Copyable Byte Offsets and Lengths
functional_units.description: Allows users to copy byte offsets, lengths, and reason codes via text selection or explicit copy actions.

functional_units.name: Jump to Hex Range Action
functional_units.description: Provides a button or link in each issue row that navigates the user to the corresponding hex range using the existing hex jump mechanism.

functional_units.name: Follow-up Actions for Issues
functional_units.description: Exposes additional actions when available for a given parsing issue, such as opening related workflows.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Accessibility Support
functional_units.description: Announces section heading and each issue row with severity context and actionable hints to aid screen reader users.

functional_units.name: CorruptionIssueSection Component
functional_units.description: A reusable SwiftUI view that renders the corruption issues list within DetailView when node.issues is not empty.

functional_units.name: CorruptionIssueRow Presentation
functional_units.description: Reuses existing badge patterns for severity color tokens and iconography in each issue row.

functional_units.name: Integration with DocumentVM/NodeVM Hex Jump
functional_units.description: Wires callbacks so tapping "View in Hex" forwards to the hex jump mechanism without breaking strict mode behavior.

functional_units.name: Selectable Text Views on macOS/iPadOS
functional_units.description: Ensures Text views are selectable/copyable and provide context menu actions for copy functionality.
